entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:06 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 02:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: SW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
